column2: select s.specobjID, s.bestobjID, s.firstrelease, s.survey, s.sourcetype, s.class, gal.ra, gal.raErr, gal.dec, gal.decErr, s.z, s.zErr, gal.r, gal.i, gal.g, gal.dered_r, gal.dered_i, gal.dered_g, gal.psfMag_r, gal.petroMag_r, gal.extinction_r, gal.petroR5#_r into mydb.LRGALL_FROMEGALAXY_changeord from Galaxy as gal join Specobj as s on gal.ObjID = s.bestobjID where (flags & (dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) | dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) | dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) )) > # and (flags & (dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) | dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) | dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) )) ! = dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) and (flags & (dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) | dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) )) = # and gal.petroMag_r > # and gal.g > # and gal.r > # and gal.i > # and (gal.petroMag_r-gal.extinction_r < # and gal.petroMag_r-gal.extinction_r < #+ (#* (gal.dered_g-gal.dered_r) +#* ((gal.dered_r-gal.dered_i) #) )/# and (gal.dered_r-gal.dered_i) - (gal.dered_g-gal.dered_r) /#-# < # and (gal.dered_r-gal.dered_i) - (gal.dered_g-gal.dered_r) /#-# > # and gal.petroMag_r-gal.extinction_r+#*log1# (#*#*gal.petroR5#_r*gal.petroR5#_r) < #) or (gal.petroMag_r-gal.extinction_r < # and (gal.dered_r-gal.dered_i) - (gal.dered_g-gal.dered_r) /#-# > #- (gal.dered_g-gal.dered_r) /# and gal.dered_g - gal.dered_r > #+#* (gal.dered_r-gal.dered_i) and ( (gal.petroMag_r-gal.extinction_r+#*log1# (#*#*gal.petroR5#_r*gal.petroR5#_r) < #) or (gal.petroMag_r-gal.extinction_r+#*log1# (#*#*gal.petroR5#_r*gal.petroR5#_r) < #) ))
